searchParameters.q: County of Siskiyou California Children's Services website

organic.title: California Children's Services (CCS) - Siskiyou County
organic.snippet: The CCS program provides diagnostic and treatment services, medical case management, and physical and occupational therapy services to children under age 21.

organic.title: Adult and Children Services | Siskiyou County California
organic.snippet: Our office receives reports of alleged abuse and/or neglect of children, dependent adults, and the elderly from mandated reporters and other community members.

organic.title: Children's System of Care | Siskiyou County California

organic.title: Child Protective Services (CPS) | Siskiyou County California
organic.snippet: Child Protective Services provides 24 hour emergency response to referrals of child abuse or neglect. Allegations are investigated by a social worker who ...

organic.title: County Offices for California Children's Services - DHCS
organic.snippet: To find out more about California Children's Services (CCS) services or the application process, please contact your county CCS office.
